items.summary: Add a 'Follow Up' task type to the backend checklist/task definitions so it is recognized as a valid task on SurgeryCase records.

Add 'Follow Up' as a checklist item in frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts with an aqua color token, so it appears in the default checklist selections and is included in task filtering and counting logic.

Update frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/workflowTokens.ts to assign an aqua color token (e.g. #00BFBF or equivalent OKLCH aqua) to the 'Follow Up' task type, and ensure the existing IconFollowUp.tsx icon uses this aqua color.

Ensure the WorkflowIcon dispatcher in frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/WorkflowIcon.tsx maps the 'Follow Up' task type string to the IconFollowUp component so the aqua circular arrow icon renders on both the Dashboard and Cases pages wherever workflow task icons are shown.
